summary: Provides a Home Assistant switch platform integration for devices that expose an aREST RESTful API, defining classes that model generic aREST switches, function-based switches, and pin-controlled switches, handling state reporting, availability checks, and on/off commands via HTTP requests, with configuration validation.
business_intent: Enables users to control and monitor aREST-enabled hardware (such as digital I/O pins or custom functions) through Home Assistant, facilitating automation and remote operation of these devices as standard switches.
